name: The Ren & Stimpy Show: Stimpy's Invention
name_original: The Ren & Stimpy Show: Stimpy's Invention
description:
The Ren & Stimpy Show: Stimpy's Invention is a platformer game. It was originally released in 1993.
You can play The Ren & Stimpy Show: Stimpy's Invention on Genesis.
It was produced by Jim Ballantine. It was directed by Bob Camp (seasons 3–5) and John Kricfalusi (seasons 1–2). It was scored by Chris Reccardi and Shawn Patterson.
